content:
Offen family

1 Joel OFFEN                         - before 1852
 + Rachel                            (Markus)
  2x Lazar OFFEN                     1791-93 - after 1870
    + Gitli                          1795-98 - before 1870 (Wolf+Chai)
          married Jan 28, 1813 #5
     3o Scheindel Certli OFFEN       1815 - before 1870
       * Jakob WEINSTEIN             1812 - Jun 23, 1878 #261
             married 1834 #14

    * Feiwel Markus SZKLARZ          1804
          married Aug 12, 1824 #27
  2x Icek OFFEN                      May 2, 1807 Krakow - May 4, 1807 Krakow




1 Chaim OFEN/BAKOFEN                 1775-83 - 1836 #356 (Feywel c1732 - 1812 #146)
 + Jentel                            c1785 (Jacob)
